name: OR_CASE_ANES_COMM
description: The OR_CASE_ANES_COMM table contains OR management system case anesthesia comments.

columns.name: OR_CASE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the case record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The number of the line of the anesthesia comments for this case.

columns.name: ANESTH_COMMENTS
columns.description: The anesthesia comments entered into the case.
